hi and welcome you're listening to the

power is easier than you think
let's get into the economic collapse

not realize is that the government they
already know that this this entire

already know that we are headed into a

unsustainable long-term trajectory
federal debt right now is already high
it's continually rising the country's
fiscal outlook in the medium and long

within a decade or so official
estimators to project debt will exceed
the size of the economy for only the

long-term path while today's high levels
of debt already threatened slow economic
growth there is literally no precedent

if policymakers don't act or do

system is going to implode it's the

is coming out of the Congressional

they already know what's going to happen
to this system and if they say if we
continue on this track with borrowing
and actually forget about continuing
since 2008 we've been accelerating the

down we're not doing anything we're
continually borrowing at a pace they
cannot be sustained now the government
office the government officials they
already understand they know what's
going to happen they've run many many

came into office he knew along with the

working with him that there was no way
out of this I think before he went in
when he was talking about bubbles how
the economy's fake talking about this is
ridiculous what is going on here Obama's
running a fake economy at that time
before he had the knowledge I think he
thought he was going to come into office
and say you know something this economy
is fake it's an illusion but I think
when he went in there and he realized
there's no way out of this the system
cannot be turned around the system
cannot be repaired at that point I think
they all decided we have two choices one
let's try to repair it let's try to
bring back manufacturing let's try to
tame the debt and see if we can make

there and then that wasn't going to work
they knew the central bank system is not
designed to do that because the central
bank is loaning the government money
with interest attached and you can never
stop this it just it just will never
ever stop think of a household
who's continually taking on debt and
they only making $50,000 a year either
one person working or both people
working but they're always just making
$50,000 a year say they get a 1%
but their expenses are continually
moving up up up the interest on their
debt is moving up up up and they
continually take out more debt after a
certain period of time it cannot be

happening here in America the central
bank system has set us on a path where
there's no way out the only way out is

bankers never going to collapse the
system because they knew they they would
have this story and they can blame it on
war they can blame it on an event they
can blame it on many other things this
way they're not blamed in the end now
the central bank they have no one to
blame this on the Trump administration
said okay let's take option two option
two is we get rid of the central bank we
collapse the system and we restart the

listen to cue and you listen to what has
been going on here you understand
the power is going to be returning to we
the people now that just doesn't mean oh

now we have the freedom you know of all

only part of it the other part of the

it's also the financial aspect of it
because if you have a central bank who
is creating the currency and then
putting interest on top of that they
control you no matter what we need to
take control completely back we the
people will take control of the entire

this is why Trump went ahead and hung

here we are right now we are heading

he's going to take down the Federal

they will not need the central bank
